review: I find this product vastly superior to its competitors. I love how easy it is to set up and instantly acess my favorite programs in Amazon Prime and Netflix with only a few clicks on the remote. It's incredibly easy to travel with or move from room to room. The quality is high and I have had no trouble with buffering.My only complaints are very mild. The lack of a power button on the remote is confusing. I learned that the Fire Stick is supposed to "sleep" after a set time of inactivity but occasionally I have found it has required a restart to work properly after it's been in "sleep" mode. It has also occasionally changed the TV input to the wrong channel when I push the home button to wake it from it's slumber. I have avoided this problem by waking it with the back button.Overall, my complaints are minor and the fire stick is well worth it's price. Enjoy!

review: The Firestick is OK, but not sure why Amazon would release something that could not cast from a computer, like the Chromecast.  Doesn't make much sense to buy this when the Chromecast does more for less money.  Not being able to cast is a huge loss of a feature, so I don't recommend until Amazon adds this functionality.
